name: Ethereal Escape
description:
Two-player local coop game where the Warrior and the Wizard must work together to escape the ethereal realm!

Warrior controls: Left click to move to the cursor's position, right click to dash

Wizard controls: Keyboard to type in the spells, right shift to  switch to movement mode, WASD to move around in movement mode

Programming: Michael Perez

3D Art: Drew Joiner

3rd Party Investor: Tara Nguyen
